-------------------------------------------------
Dependencies
-------------------------------------------------

scikit-learn
pip install --upgrade scikit-learn

fastapi
pip install fastapi

The web service can be executed, at least, in one of the following servers:

uvicorn
pip install uvicorn

daphne
pip install daphne

hypercorn
pip install hypercorn

-------------------------------------------------
Running the web service.
-------------------------------------------------
In the folder where app.py is located.

    uvicorn app:app --workers 1 --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000

    or
			
    daphne -b 127.0.0.1 -p 8000 app:app
	
    or

    hypercorn app:app -b 127.0.0.1:8000 --worker-class trio --workers 1

-------------------------------------------------
API documentation: 
-------------------------------------------------

http://127.0.0.1:8000/docs (in your browser)
http://127.0.0.1:8000/redoc (in your browser)

I'm using port 8000 in these examples! Change this to the port being used!

-------------------------------------------------
Example output: 
	/app/api/v1/models/{model_id}/forecast/
-------------------------------------------------
